name: Russian Roads
description: "Russian Roads" - this is amazing race on rough roads, on the dirt road and in the mud. Travel in different cars of the Russian car industry and try to come first!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750ti Storage: 1500 MB available space
